name: express-less-middleware
description: Compiles LESS on a per request basis in Express
author: Alex Vernacchia <alvernacchia@gmail.com>

scripts.test: istanbul cover _mocha --report lcovonly -- test/*.js --reporter list --timeout 100000 && cat ./coverage/lcov.info | ./node_modules/coveralls/bin/coveralls.js && rm -rf ./coverage
